javadoc:
Listener that is notified when a tool is added or removed from a 
 workspace, or when workspace properties change.

methods.name: toolAdded
methods.comment: Notification that a tool was added to the given workspace.

methods.name: toolRemoved
methods.comment: Notification that a tool was removed from the given workspace.

params.name: tool
params.comment: tool that was removed from the workspace

methods.javadoc:
Notification that the given workspace was added by the ToolManager.
@param ws workspace the affected workspace
methods.name: workspaceAdded
methods.comment: Notification that the given workspace was added by the ToolManager.

methods.javadoc:
Notification that the given workspace was removed by the ToolManager.
@param ws workspace the affected workspace
methods.name: workspaceRemoved
methods.comment: Notification that the given workspace was removed by the ToolManager.

methods.javadoc:
Notification that the given workspace is the current one.
@param ws workspace the affected workspace
methods.name: workspaceSetActive
methods.comment: Notification that the given workspace is the current one.

name: WorkspaceChangeListener
comment:
Listener that is notified when a tool is added or removed from a 
 workspace, or when workspace properties change.
